title: Throne room

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Throne room is a room that is used to 'rule' a player-owned house. It can be built at level 60 Construction with 150,000.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Throne room
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Throne room
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level60
Cost150,000
Door layout
Throne room

A Throne room is a room that is used to 'rule' a player-owned house. It can be built at level 60 Construction with 150,000.

The throne room has only one entrance, but perhaps two exits.

There are 6 hotspots available:

  • Decoration space
  • Floor space
  • Lever space
  • Seating space
  • Throne space
  • Trapdoor space

Contents

  • 1 Decoration
  • 2 Floor
  • 3 Lever
  • 4 Seating
  • 5 Throne
  • 6 Trapdoor

Decoration[edit | edit source]

Decorations are hung on walls, and are purely for aesthetic purposes. The 'shield' class of decorations will reflect the family crest told to the player by Sir Renitee, the Falador Herald.

Level Decoration Materials Experience Cost
16 Oak wall decoration Oak plank x2 120 918
36 Teak wall decoration Teak plank x2 180 1,672
56 Gilded decoration Mahogany plank x3
Gold leaf x2 		1,020 277,286
66 Round shield Oak plank x2 120 918
76 Square shield Teak plank x4 360 3,344
86 Kite shield Mahogany plank x3 420 6,264

Floor[edit | edit source]

There are several different types of traps in this room. The steel cage trap can only trap your opponents in the cage; a trapdoor can drop opponents into an oubliette, if there is one below the throne room; a lesser magical cage can hold opponents, drop them into an oubliette, or release them; a greater magical cage can do all of the above, except it can also expel and teleport those caught in the trap.

Level Flooring Materials Experience Cost Effect when lever pulled
61 Floor decoration Mahogany plank x5 700 10,440 Nothing.
68 Steel cage Mahogany plank x5
Steel bar x20 		1,100 19,100 The victims are trapped in a steel cage.
74 Trapdoor Mahogany plank x5
Clockwork x10 		770 17,280 The victims are dropped into the oubliette below.
82 Lesser magic cage Mahogany plank x5
Magic stone x2 		2,700 1,993,676 The victims are trapped in a magic cage. They can be released or dropped into the oubliette.
89 Greater magic cage Mahogany plank x5
Magic stone x4 		4,700 3,976,912 The victims are trapped in a greater magic cage. They can be released, dropped into the oubliette, or teleported away.

Lever[edit | edit source]

The lever, if pulled, can trigger the centre trap that is in this throne room.

It can also be used by the house owner to set challenge mode and activate the house Dungeon monsters and traps, and to set the dungeon PvP mode, which also activates the dungeon monsters and traps in addition to allowing players to fight each other in any room underground.

If players die in the house, they will not lose any items.

Level Lever Materials Experience Cost
68 Oak lever Oak plank x5 300 2,295
78 Teak lever Teak plank x5 450 4,180
88 Mahogany lever Mahogany plank x5 700 10,440

Seating[edit | edit source]

These are only used for sitting and watching. The two bench hotspots here are the same as in the dining room, so the same flatpacks can be used.

Level Seating Materials Experience Cost
44 Carved teak bench Teak plank x4 360 3,344
52 Mahogany bench Mahogany plank x4 560 8,352
61 Gilded bench Mahogany plank x4
Gold leaf x4 		1,760 550,396

Throne[edit | edit source]

Building any of these thrones will make both thrones appear in both spots.

Level Throne Materials Experience Cost
60 Oak throne Oak plank x5
Marble block 		800 333,908
67 Teak throne Teak plank x5
Marble block x2 		1,450 667,406
74 Mahogany throne Mahogany plank x5
Marble block x3 		2,200 1,005,279
81 Gilded throne Mahogany plank x5
Marble block x2
Gold leaf x3 		1,700 1,080,199
88 Skeleton throne Magic stone x5
Marble block x4
Bones x5
Skull x2 		7,003 6,284,852
95 Crystal throne Magic stone x15 15,000 14,874,270
99 Demonic throne Magic stone x25 25,000 24,790,450

Trapdoor[edit | edit source]

The trapdoor gives access to the oubliette, if there is one below the throne room. Only the house owner may use this. The floor Trapdoor is different from these trapdoor as it functions as a trap. The trapdoor is tied with the oubliette's ladder - for example building an Oak trapdoor will always produce a pairing oak ladder in the oubliette, and removing either will remove both the trapdoor and ladder.

Level Trapdoor Materials Experience Cost
68 Oak trapdoor Oak plank x5 300 2,295
78 Teak trapdoor Teak plank x5 450 4,180
88 Mahogany trapdoor Mahogany plank x5 700 10,440
